8.Pros: Hours are flexible and can work around school and other events.Easy job to acquire and after a couple weeks it is relatively easy to keep up
8.Cons: Managers and crew are in and out so no real stability in the restaurant. Pay starts at 8.25 and lower for people who aren't necessarily legal from what I have heard. Raises are every 6 months and can range from nothing to .25 $ based in performance, but ultimately raises are based off management. Scheduling can be a bit off especially if you ask for time off you may get a whole week off after requesting only one day off.

9.Cons: Not flexible, long hours, low pay
